price: He had already misled great multitudes of you. Did you not then have sense?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمۡ جِبِلّٗا كَثِيرًاۖ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
